Comments_List: Reviewing and critiquing marketing literature , model development and estimation

Occasional feedback would be nice. 

The choice of papers was questionable at times.
It would be helpful to get a brief overview of the topic area during class instead of jumping right in.

I think less time spent on presentations and more time spent on discussion, framing the papers in the current work of the field, etc. would help this course. We also didn't receive any feedback on either the written or presentation components.

I found it helpful when professors explained the topic area (current trends, its history, relevance to our research) before jumping into the presentations. It could also be helpful if professors could guide us to spot the merits of the paper because I didn't have enough background to know what the faults and merits of each paper is.
Yes must take for marketing majors
